helpUsBringVtuber: help us bring VTubers to your Conventions
helpUsBringVtuberDesc: This website is a fanmade effort to make it easier for VTuber fans to invite their favorite VTuber to anime conventions and to give a guideline for conventions on how to contact them. We focus on Hololive EN, but this site should prove useful for other VTuber agencies and indies as well.
